page.title: 01Summary.
page.content: The area surveyed by Class 4 of Saint Philip's R.C.Primary School Uckfield contained a variety of landscapes, including woodland,farmland ,urban and rural. At the time of writing some of this farmland and woodland is soon to be lost to major housing and industrial development.Naturally many of the local inhabitants are angry about this. They are worried about over_development and erosion of greenbelt areas. Apart from fringe housing estates of Uckfield the only residential area surveyed was the village of Framfield situated some 5km fromthe town of Uckfield. Framfield is a pleasnt rural village that has successfully mixed old world charm with a modern housing estate. It seems particularly popular with retired couples.
